评论详情: This set is very pretty. However while putting on the earrings the very first time the hook came off. I was able to reattach it. Then later in evening the necklace broke. The cord it was on was falling apart like it has dry rotted.  Not worth the money. Very disappointed.

评论概述: Just the perfect accessory for my Halloween costume.
评论详情: It's the perfect size the earrings are beautiful as well. I will probably wear it More than just with my costume.
The necklace and earrings are fairly large but also quite pretty. Great for a Halloween costume.
